title: Riot girl tristana
body:
Showing off some riot girl tristana visual bugs in the  patch 5.14
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QWC-3NDjWf4

replies.body:
Hey Jim Dandy,

Looks like you were on Patch 5.14 when this occurred. This issue should be resolved with the update for Patch 5.15. :]
Btw can you guys fix a bug where some skins dont show in skin select. For Example Riot Girl is missing and I can't select her :(

Is it possible you don't have that content unlocked? It's a free skin available via [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/leagueoflegends/app_208195102528120). While free, you'll need to unlock it by liking the League of Legends Facebook page.
Wow, first time anyone from Riot has talked to me directly [check that off the bucket-list (excluding Riot support]. And I do have it unlocked, others have the same problem.

Hm, okay. 

If you've done the Facebook steps, the next step would be to contact [Player Support](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) so we could take a look at your account and make sure it's unlocked properly.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=xEXjw00s,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-05T16:22:56.095+0000)
>
> Hey Jim Dandy,
> 
> Looks like you were on Patch 5.14 when this occurred. This issue should be resolved with the update for Patch 5.15. :]

Fixed! Please tell the guys/gals responsible "thank you!" For taking care of it. I can now spam my emotes with pride again.
You got i! :D Glad it's working again!
I wouldnt call that a bug...id call that an upgrade! trist only uses her cannon arm now!
Strange that this bug was found in the newest patch
